item.description:
Let's celebrate the magic of the season with a special Sunday brunch at Water's Edge Resort in Westbrook with friends, old and new. What a splendid way to share the joy of the upcoming holiday over a leisurely brunch...breakfast, lunch, good conversation and laughter.

The menu is sumputous...take a look...

http://www.watersedge...

Looks great, doesn't it? So let's make it a date! Join us for the festivities before the holiday rush begins!

BTW...if anyone is interested in taking part in a grab bag...please indicate with your RSVP. Let's cap it at $10.00. If interested, you will be asked when you RSVP. Please keep it gender neutral and just bring it with you the day of the event.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Terri or the Meetup Sign...
item.name: Season's Greetings! A Special Holiday Brunch at Water's Edge Resort...
